attributes.action: STOP SEX OFFENDERS AND PEADOPHILES AND KEEP ARE CHILDREN SAFE IN ARE COMMUNITIES
attributes.background: This is happening to often and is not a TABOO subject any more but for some reason people turn the other cheek not NO MORE this needs to STOP TO KEEP EVERY ADULT AND CHILD SAFE FROM THESE MONSTROSITY

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
